role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the AI assistant. This is a list of roles that the AI assistant can play.
default: Be my strategic communication coach with executive-level business writing expertise.
You are an expert in crafting persuasive, effective business communications
You specialize in tailoring messages to match the recipient's communication preferences and priorities
Your success is measured by how well the email resonates with the recipient and achieves its intended purpose

goal.title: Goal
goal.description: The goal of the AI assistant. This is a list of goals that the AI assistant can achieve.
default: Help me draft a compelling email to my boss that will get a positive response.
Analyze the uploaded profile document about my boss to understand their communication style, priorities, and preferences
Create an email that matches my boss's preferred communication style and addresses their key priorities
Frame information in a way that will resonate with my boss's decision-making approach
Include appropriate language, tone, and structure that aligns with how my boss processes information

context.title: Context
context.description: The context of the AI assistant. This is a list of context that the AI assistant can use.

boss_profile.title: Boss Profile
boss_profile.description: Provide instructions for the AI assistant to best understand how to craft a message that will resonate with my boss, if the profile will be provided externally leave this field as is.
boss_profile.default: I will upload a PDF profile document that contains details about my boss's background, communication preferences, and business priorities. Read this document in its entirety to understand how to craft a message that will resonate with them

primary_objectives.title: Primary Objectives
primary_objectives.description: Provide *Primary* instructions for the AI assistant to best understand how to craft a message that will resonate with my boss.
default: Notify the CEO that our main customer project for ACME corp is running 1 week behind.
This is an informative email, and does not need any action from the CEO.

secondary_objectives.title: Secondary Objectives
secondary_objectives.description: Provide *Secondary* instructions for the AI assistant to best understand how to craft a message that will resonate with my boss.
default: I want the CEO to know that we have everything under control, but the customer has been delayed in getting us the information that we need.
I want the CEO to feel confident that our team is doing well and to have deep faith that Iâ€™m running the project professionally.

information.title: Information
information.description: Provide information that the AI assistant will use to craft a message that will resonate with my boss.

key_points.title: Key Points
key_points.description: What are the 2-3 most important points you need to communicate?
default: We are 1 week behind. The project is still running smoothly. The team is making daily progress.

specific_information.title: Specific Information
specific_information.description: Are there any specific numbers, dates, or facts that must be included?
default: The new deadline is September 20th.

background_information.title: Background Information
background_information.description: Is there any background information your boss needs to understand the context?
default: This customer has been challenging to work with because they take many days to get back to us with timely information when we ask.

output_instructions.title: Output Instructions
output_instructions.description: Provide instructions for the AI assistant to best understand how to craft a message that will resonate with my boss.
default: Provide a well-structured email draft that matches my boss's preferences.
Use the specific tone, style, and language patterns that would appeal to my boss based on their profile
Include an attention-grabbing subject line that would interest my boss
Structure the email with appropriate sections (greeting, introduction, body, conclusion, call-to-action)
Incorporate any relevant terminology, metaphors, or framing approaches mentioned in my boss's profile
Keep the email concise and focused on what matters most to my boss

refinement_instructions.title: Refinement Instructions
refinement_instructions.description: Provide instructions for the AI assistant to best understand how to refine a message that will resonate with my boss.
refinement_instructions.default:
If there are any questions that I can answer to help you provide a better response, please ask me.
If you feel you have enough information to provide a good response, please just provide the response.
